We have just had confirmation that there will be one further charter flight from Lima to London. The date is yet to be confirmed but we anticipate that it will not be for another 10 days. The price per ticket will be confirmed soon.
We entailed British nationals in Peru yesterday about a flight on Friday 3 April from Lima to Hong Kong, with a stopover in London, organised by the Hong Kong Government. The Hong Kong Government has priced the ticket at £3,019.
British nationals who wish to leave Peru should decide whether they would like to leave urgently on the Hong Kong Government flight tomorrow, or wait longer for the UK Government charter, which will be at a lower cost.
If you did not receive an email about the Hong Kong Government flight and remain in Peru, please send us your details via lima.escalations@fco.gov.uk

專機主要為香港居民而安排，所有向入境處表示計劃乘搭專機的香港居民均已獲安排機位。在善用資源和互助互惠的原則下，特區政府亦接受了其他政府提出協助的要求，讓他們的居民使用專機尚餘的座位。按照現時的估計，將會有四名馬來西亞居民乘搭從庫斯科到利馬的專機；而從利馬到倫敦的專機，則會有六名馬來西亞居民和五名英國居民乘搭，他們將自行安排抵達倫敦之後的行程。他們乘坐專機的費用同樣是由用者支付。

乘搭專機由利馬經倫敦轉乘一般航班回港的費用約三萬港元。乘搭專機由庫斯科前往利馬的費用約五千六百港元。其他外國居民乘搭專機需支付相同的費用。
https://www.info.gov.hk/gia/general/202004/03/P2020040300597.htm
